name: Spikey's Adventure
description:
Just an idea, not sure whether to continue with this game. Would love people to try and see what they think. Not much can be done, just walk around the level and talk to a couple characters

Was thinking the game would require the player to do several tasks per level, and would be open play, so you could go between levels whenever you want .

Requires a joypad controller.

Windows only for now.

CONTROLS:
Left stick -  left/right
A - Jump/double jump
X - Interact/talk

Hold A - Swim underwater

Thanks.
